member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.BlazorHostingApplicationBuilderExtensions.UseBlazorMobileWithElectronNET(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.IApplicationBuilder,System.Type)
member.summary: Call of this method will notify to BlazorMobile that the runtime is actually running under ElectronNET (server-side) NOTE: Usage of blazor.server.js in your starting page is mandatory. If using BlazorMobile.Build on your Blazor base project, you should register 'server_index.html' at this app start.
